name: FB Wall and Evernote Notes
tagline: Rebuilding FB wall and Evernote notes via simple PHP (no frameworks)
body:
### Entirely built from scratch:
- a full user registration / login with validation
- Facebook's "Wall"
- Evernote's "notes" 

This project's aim was to learn the "backend" of how login and registration pages work as well as sessions and building RESTful architecture from scratch.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
